EmailTemplate.name: Cybersecurity Webinar Invite Mahdi Muhtaseb EN.Cybersecurity Webinar Invite Mahd
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invite - Cybersecurity webinar series
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
With the rise of widely dispersed networks, remote workforces, and accelerated cloud adoption, organizations are under increased pressure to secure their data from continually evolving network attacks. As a Government department, I know you’re always under additional scrutiny to implement enhanced security measures that protect your users, data and devices from outside threats.
To help you learn about the different solutions available, we’ve partnered with leaders in cybersecurity to bring you an exclusive webinar series. You’ll learn how to outsmart cyberattacks with tools like robust firewalls, advanced hardware, seamless management and more.
Register now <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/GT_Webinar_Signup.html?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> to stay ahead of impending cyberthreats.
If you have any questions or would like to discuss further, please feel free to reach out. If there is a colleague of yours that would be more appropriate to connect with about this, can you please forward this email to them?
Best,
Mahdi Muhtaseb Account Manager
Providing you with the products, services and solutions your business needs to be more productive and successful.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6
E-mail: MahdiMuhtaseb@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:: MahdiMuhtaseb@grandandtoy.com ]]> | Cell: 613-286-2398 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
If you're having difficulty accessing the link in this email, please copy and paste the following link into your web browser: https://go.grandandtoy.com/GT_Webinar_Signup.html Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
